item.title: Coding is Creative
item.description:
When you think about programming (or coding), you might not consider it to be a creative pursuit. Thatâ€™s a viewpoint that I, as a coder, was very confused by, because I see it as one of the better avenues for creativity available today.

I hope this piece changes the way you think about programming and encourages further exploration.

Programming as a creative outlet can be understood by comparing it to traditional artistic pursuit.
